title: Chief of Police
desc:
Post 32
***Radio** (Passive)*
Access a factional chat with other Police-subaligned players.
***Internal Affairs** (1x, charge 100%)*
During the evening phase, target a Police-subaligned player. All of their abilities become Unlocked.
***Mourning Leader** (Passive)*
If a Police-subaligned player dies, you are roleblocked the following night.
***Protective Detail** (Passive)*
If you are attacked, the Police-subaligned player with lowest standard deviation will be attacked in your place and will automatically counterattack.
***Overtime***
You may use any Police Officer ability.
***Bureaucratic Selection** (Passive)*
This role is unique. You must spawn with at least one Police Officer. If you die, the highest-scoring Police Officer immediately becomes Chief of Police.
